nodes.text: The New Heurkea system was a star system located in Mon Calamari Space of the Outer Rim Territories. It lay between the Mantan and Sanctuary systems on the Prously's Rim Run hyperlane. The system shared its name with Heurkea, a city on the planet Mon Calamari.
The New Heurkea system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square U-6.
